message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you a decent amount for your first offer. Accept and we can finish the game!
I'm not going for a small share, let's try for something better!
You're being stubborn, but I'll give you a bit more. Take it or leave it!
I'm starting to get desperate, but I'm still hoping for a better deal!
You're getting desperate, I can see it! Take this offer or walk away, I'm not getting any younger!
I'm running out of patience, but I'm still holding out for a better deal!
